Html:
Since I can't seem to find a definitive answer, this is probably a dumb question, but...

I would like to upgrade my current .NET 3.5 Prism V2 project to .NET 4.0.  Is this something I can do now or will I need to wait for Prism 4.0?

Tks.

Well, I have figured out that I could do this.  A few issues that I am working through so not sure it's all going to end up working, but we'll see.  Will post some results if/when I get it completed.

Right now, I am running into issues with how events are handled by my EventCommander which comes from the Cinch framework.
i did it and no problem Gorter! Works fine on .Net4, silverlight 4 and VS 2010 Professional.
